name: Venomin & Q prototype
description:
This is a prototype for my game Venomin & Q. The game is not finished yet though.

Venomin & Q is a first person shooter. There are 2 weapons in the prototype (Should be more in final release)

Tell me what you think should be improved in the final release or future prototypes!

Controls

Wasd to move

Space to jump

Click to shoot

1/2 to switch weapons

F1 to restart and Esc to quit
